history.proof: intros d sigma H1 H2. hauto use: dta_kill_non_coacc_correct_wrt_sign, kill_non_coacc_lazy_eq_kill_non_coacc.

exceptions.exn: In environment p : preDTA a : ad sigma : signature H1 : preDTA_ref_ok p H2 : predta_correct_wrt_sign p sigma a0 : ad s : state Unable to unify "MapGet state (predta_kill_non_coacc ?M1854 ?M1855) a0 = Some s" with "MapGet state (predta_kill_non_coacc_lazy p a) a0 = Some s".

In environment p : preDTA a : ad sigma : signature H1 : preDTA_ref_ok p H2 : predta_correct_wrt_sign p sigma Unable to unify "preDTA_ref_ok p" with "predta_correct_wrt_sign (predta_kill_non_coacc_lazy p a) sigma".

In environment p : preDTA a : ad sigma : signature H1 : preDTA_ref_ok p H2 : predta_correct_wrt_sign p sigma Unable to unify "predta_correct_wrt_sign p sigma" with "predta_correct_wrt_sign (predta_kill_non_coacc_lazy p a) sigma".

In environment p : preDTA a : ad sigma : signature H1 : preDTA_ref_ok p H2 : predta_correct_wrt_sign p sigma Unable to unify "preDTA_ref_ok p" with "predta_correct_wrt_sign (predta_kill_non_coacc_lazy p a) sigma".

In environment p : preDTA a : ad sigma : signature H1 : preDTA_ref_ok p H2 : predta_correct_wrt_sign p sigma Unable to unify "predta_correct_wrt_sign p sigma" with "predta_correct_wrt_sign (predta_kill_non_coacc_lazy p a) sigma".

original: intros d sigma H1 H2. unfold dta_correct_wrt_sign, dta_kill_non_coacc_lazy. destruct d; simpl in *. apply predta_kill_non_coacc_correct_wrt_sign. - apply H1. - apply H2. - apply H1. - apply H2.
